homepage.description1: Whether you're new here or consider yourself a local, Taskorilla helps you get tasks done or earn by helping others.
homepage.description2: Big jobs, small jobs, or anything in between, find trusted helpers or professionals, or offer your skills, and get results quickly and safely.
homepage.postTaskSubtitle: Get help to get things done!
homepage.browseTasksSubtitle: Get paid to get things done!

landing.heroSubtitle: Simple errands or tricky challenges, Taskorilla connects you with helpers who think fast, work smart, and get things done without the hassle.
landing.step1Text: Need something done in Portugal? Describe your task, set your budget, and post it. Helpers nearby can submit offers instantly. Only €2 per completed task. Connect with trusted helpers and get things done quickly.
landing.step2Text: Pick up extra work, show off your skills, and get hired fast. Helpers keep their earnings minus a 10% commission, and task posters pay only when the job is done. Build your reputation with badges, reviews, and a shareable profile. Perfect for newcomers looking to earn while settling in Portugal.
landing.step3Text: Chat with your helper or tasker, track progress, upload photos, and mark the task done. Leave and receive reviews so everyone knows who's reliable. Stay on top of your tasks, whether you're new in town or a long-time resident.
landing.brainyBrawnyText: Skilled, reliable, and clever. Our helpers tackle tasks big and small, from everyday errands to professional services. Show off your skills, services, or professional role, earn badges, collect reviews, and get noticed.
landing.fastLocalText: Helpers nearby see your tasks instantly, submit offers, and chat in real time. Taskers can search for helpers by skills, services, or professional role to find the perfect match.
landing.trustText: Reviews go both ways. Taskers can review helpers, and helpers can review taskers. Track progress, upload photos, and see verified feedback so everyone knows who's reliable.
landing.flexibleText: Set your budget, choose the best fit, and stay in control. Your information stays private, and instant alerts keep you in the loop. Post tasks and offer help without juggling multiple accounts.
landing.communityText: Taskorilla is not just a service. It is a community of smart, strong helpers and taskers making life easier. Shareable profiles, badges, and discoverable skills make it simple, fun, and effective.
landing.mascotText: Post your task today and let Taskorilla handle the heavy lifting, with brains, brawn, and brilliance.
